items.sentence: I used to volunteer at the local soup kitchen.
I usually eat a bowl of oatmeal for breakfast.
I usually get to work about ten minutes early.
I want Tom to come over and apologize to Mary.
I want Tom to have a chance for a decent life.
Tom noticed Mary\'s bed hadn\'t been slept in.
Where do you think all these people came from?
Tom and Mary both are drinking the same thing.
Please don\'t interrupt me when I\'m speaking.
You should just keep doing what you\'re doing.
I come home at 2:30 on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
I could hear several audience members snoring.
Tom and Mary are going to do that this summer.
Tom and Mary are longtime residents of Boston.
Tom and Mary chose Hawaii for their honeymoon.
You\'d better not go out in this cold weather.
You\'d better not let Tom know you enjoyed it.
Your words of encouragement meant a lot to me.
Do you want fresh ground pepper on your salad?
Do you want me to tell you exactly what I ate?
